descripcion:
• 3-Quality Analyst (2)

    We are hiring remote, work from home, Call Center Quality Analysts!

    Quality Analysts are responsible for ensuring compliance and production standards are consistently maintained.

    The QA will partner with the supervisor to evaluate team members based on QA trend reporting to provide effective coaching/feedback to agents where applicable. QA’s will be expected to measure daily team performance and quality standards based on established call center metrics and benchmarks.

    Requirements:

    Advanced English

    QA analyst experience

    Laptop or computer with windows 10

    10MB+ of internet connection

    Noise cancelling headset with mic

    Reliable Electricity

    Dominican Cédula Only

    A reliable and dedicated individual

    Must live in Santiago or nearby areas since you’ll be working on our site eventually

    Benefits:

    Online, paid training

    Schedule: 9am – 6pm and 11:00 am to 8:00 pm Monday to Friday, Saturdays 9 to 1pm

    Health insurance

    Law benefits

    Salary $29,000 monthly
